summary:
Replaces \"FUS\" \"RO\" \"DAH\" with \"Ex\" \"Cali\" \"bur\" respectively. And level up the Shout\'s Power. Now you can use the Shout to deal a lot of damage in the skyrim.
(Excalibur voice from the Game Fate/staynight\'s saber voice)
descriptionHtml:
1/5 Updated 
New version! 
Test Video:
http://youtu.be/vm8W7wvk6R8

Firebreath change to Excalibur shout AND..
Level up the Firebreath\'s power.
Now,  your Excalibur shout really have POWER, not just a Voice.
I combine Unrelenting Force\'s push effect and Firebreath. 
and level up this shout\'s power.

but it\'s hard to balance the damage. so I release 2 version.
one is normal version, it\'s powerful, but not imbalance I think...
and cold time is 3mins.

another version is Imbalance version, VERY powerful, even I install Deadly Dragon Mod,
it\'s still deal a lot of damage on the dragon, maybe someone like this version.
this version\'s cold time is 5mins. 

Even it seem like Fire attack ..(what are you talking about, it\'s Firebreath! if not like fire, what you want to like?) 
BUT IT\'S NOT FIRE DAMAGE. 
it works like Unrelenting Force, maybe is Magic Damage.
so it can be deal damage on fire elemental and fire dragons.

----HOW TO INSTALL-----

Extract to Skyrim/data/
or Use MNN to install.
remember to turn on the .esp

---------------------------------

BUGS
Please report to me to know. Thanks!

---------------------------------

----Sorry, my English is poor----

Hi everyon, this is my first time to make a mod. 
the idea from \"This is Sparta\" mod
(\" This is Sparta\" mod : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1294 )
after use sparta mod, i think maybe i can change the shout to my favorite Saber\'s shout.
so I did it.

Test video:
http://youtu.be/Bi5PNUFdxxI

Hope you guys that love Fate/staynight can like it. :)

----HOW TO INSTALL-----
Extract to Skyrim/data/
---------------------------------

12/14
Add new file
single change Dragonrend\'s shout to Excalibur.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

12/16
Add new file \"one word Excalibur\"

1. now you just need to use one word like \"Fus\" or \"Joor\" can hear full \"Excalibur\" voice.
    it\'s for someone who only have one or two words of the shout.
    and I think it\'s more better...maybe :P

2. Use Dark Saber\'s voice to replace \"Dragonrend\"\'s Excalibur voice.
   so, now your \"Unrelenting Force Excalibur\" and \"Dragonrend Excalibur\" sounds different.

3. Use Saber\'s Voice \"ikuzo(japanese...means go go or ready to go...maybe... :P)\" to replace \"Whirlwind Sprint\".

Test Video
http://youtu.be/jasW6fya8zA

-----------------------------------------------------------------

12/24
Merry Christmas! 

Add new 2 shouts all from Saber\'s voice.
1. \"Become Ethereal\" change to Saber\'s \"Avalon\" shout. 

2. \"Unrelenting Force\" change to Saber\'s \"kazeo\" shout.
I have watch the fate/zero, but \"Strike Air\" voice is not clean, I mean it have backgrond voice.
so I use the \"fate unlimited codes\"\'\'s \"kazeo\" voice. I think it\'s similar skill. Although the animate\'s voice is more POWERFUL....
If you use \"Excalibur shout\'\' that it will replace it.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

12/27
Add new 2 files.
1. \"FUS RO DAH change to Strike Airrrrr\"
This is made by Sixa, thank you so much!
a friend from the net. 
He made the mod that \"FUS RO DAH\" changes to Saber\'s \"Strike Airrrrr!\" 
(This skill is from \"Fate/Zero\", When Saber fight Caster with Lancer.)

2. \"Elemental Fury\" change to Kazeo shout
Why do I not find this Shout before..? This shout have Cool effect. and powerful!
lkl123, Thank you!
So now, with this mod, you can Hear Saber shout \"Kazeo~\" then your Sword have the Wind.

I have try to replace the 2 hand sword powerattack\'s animation to Shout\'s animation, 
it\'s work, but only when you \"Stand and shout\" that can see the animation,
when you run or walk and use shout, that will not be active, I think maybe need only 
upper body\'s animation that can be work...

If someone know how to change it, please tell me how to do, 
or if you can make the mod, I will very happy to download and play with it.
Thanks.

-----------------------------------------------------------------
p.s. This is ONLY WORKS ON WOMAN, so if you want you can install sparta mod fisrt then replace my mod, that you can let the man shout \"This is Sparta\", woman shout \"Excalibur\".

Enjoy it. :)
and thanks for watch.

-------------------------------------------------------------------
About the mod in the test video

Excalibur and Calibur Sword mod 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3542&navtag=file/images.php?id=3542&tab=3

Miku Mod (this author also made other mod, such like Ruka and her clothes, you can find it in his posted)
http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-2628365-1-1.html

Thank you for your support and reply.
author: fenixant
